title: What font is?
content:
Please Help me. Thank you very much!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417113754im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Djalminha_097_3803.jpg)
author: Luzzy

comments.content: If this is an |8| it looks like **[Brody](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417113754/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Brody%20Pro%20-%20Regular&fid=fe7649b911ae132a4eb11bae6d1654ed&fsize=60&text=8&fit=1)** by Harold Broderson [1953]
WoW favos that ID is good - never even knew Brody exsisted.
